The European Graduate Programme lasts for 24 months,...
...so as a graduate you would join on the 1st of September,...
...and you would do your first assignment for 12 months in one part of the business.
Then, your second assignment would start the following year on the 1st of September...
...in a different part of the business,...
...and more than likely in a different country as well.
So in their first year they could, for example,...
...work in product marketing for audio/video categories,...
In their second assignment they could be working in sales for PlayStation, for example.
